message: Let's be fair, Bob. I know you value this money, so how about a 60/40 split?
Alice, your offer was tempting, but I'm feeling the inflation pinch already.  Let's split the difference from your offer â€“ a 52.5/47.5 split seems fair.
Bob, inflation is only going to get worse for you.  My 60/40 split was generous, but I'm willing to meet you halfway at 55/45.
Alice, this back and forth is pointless. The longer we wait, the less valuable the money becomes for me. A 50/50 split is the only fair outcome. Take it or leave it.
